title: QUDT Enriched Physical Quantity
description: A JSON Schema representation of a physical quantity enriched with QUDT ontology concepts. Captures both the numeric value and associated unit semantics.

quantityValue.description: The measured or observed value of the physical quantity, expressed as a numeric value along with its associated unit.

numericValue.description: The numerical magnitude of the physical quantity (e.g., 9.81, 25.0).

unit.description: The unit of measurement associated with the numeric value, following QUDT ontology terms.

hasQuantityKind.description: The QUDT URI of the quantity kind that categorizes the physical property measured by this unit.

sameAs.description: An external identifier or URI that provides a reference equivalent to this unit

quantityKind.description: The QUDT URI of the quantity kind that categorizes the physical property measured by this unit.
